subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Michael Waltrip proved he did not need to cheat to make Daytona and four-time series champion Jeff Gordon, who won his qualifying race, failed a postrace inspection and will start the race near the back of the field.
snippet: Michael Waltrip proved he did not need to cheat to make Daytona and four-time series champion Jeff Gordon, who won his qualifying race, failed a postrace inspection and will start the race near the back of the field.
